level.text: 6608.1 Penalties for failure to comply with a final compliance order, a finalease and desist order, or a final suspension, revocation or denial order shalle in accordance with D.C. Code §§ 8-113.09(d) through (g).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 7835, 7921 (November 12, 1993); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7699 (October 1, 1999); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 6678 (August 21, 2009).
